DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project investigate whether 12-week , fulltime pulmonary rehabilitation program enhance cognitive functioning , mood , anxiety , quality life patient Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Rehabilitation : Effects Cognitive Functioning , Mood , Anxiety , Quality Life Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD Referral Extensive Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program Unfinished primary school Referral Compact Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program
